Option A: TIA symptoms last more than 24 hours
Option B: TIA is always associated with infarction on imaging
Option C: TIA confers a high risk of stroke in the next 48 hours
Option D: TIA is caused only by emboli
Correct Answer: TIA confers a high risk of stroke in the next 48 hours
